column1: Traffic reports will resume Thursday September 14 at 4:00 p.m.

column3: TRAFFIC ALERT FOR RICHMOND RD AT S ASHLAND AVE:
column4: All outbound lanes are shut down until further notice due to a serious collision involving a motorcycle at Irvine Rd.

column3: TRAFFIC ALERT FOR RICHMOND RD AT S ASHLAND AVE:
column4: Motorists can expect the roadway to be shut down for at least 2-3 hours.  Updates as available.
